t: Lola and The Boys | Trendy Kids and Women's Clothing Boutique
s: Lola and The Boys is a trendy kids and women's clothing boutique located in Chicago, Illinois. Find fashions for boys, girls, preteens and mommy too! We're a chic clothing store in Chicago, IL but we ship worldwide our trendy clothes for kids and your little ones.

Lola and the Boys is a fantastically fun brand that was born in Chicago in 2016. Every collection from this popular children’s clothing brand is full of eye-popping statement pieces and awe-inspiring accessories. Their pieces prove that kid’s fashion can be outrageously fun and wearable ...

Lola & The Boys is a Chicago based brand that makes fashion for kids that is playful, trendy & chic. The creator, Irina, named her brand after her 3 children. Being a fashion model herself, Irina is always bringing in fresh fashion forward designs that will make your little babe smile.
